<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Draconic Toxin Bottle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2378)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 191 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This glass bottle appears to be a [_dragon's breath potion_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=185) of a specific dragon type (usually red) but has been polluted, making it toxic to use.

<document level="2" id="action-1946" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
